name: Explorers - The Game
description:
At last you have found it!

A new world, untouched and not yet explored. And there are good reasons for that: The landscape is made up of floating rocks that kept this world hidden for years by their movement.
But unfortunately, you are not alone. Other explorers are also trying to travel through this strange world and get rich off its resources.
It's up to you to make the best use of the exploration maps and cleverly plan your route to become the greatest explorer of all time!
Experience the fascination of this tactical flip & write game by Phil Walker-Hardinga from Ravensburger in this app.
Dive in easily with the tutorial and discover more and more diverse tactical possibilities with each game!

Key Facts:

- Flip & Write game
- Tutorial for easy start
- 3 different game modes with varying degrees of randomness
- 32 order tiles provide maximum variety and constantly new challenges
- Compete with players from all over the world in weekly highscore lists
- Collect Achievements and become the greatest explorer of all time.
